nodes.text: Zef Ando was a male Rodian moisture farmer who lived on Tatooine during the Galactic Civil War After the Battle of Yavin, he lived as a squatter in the Lars homestead Circa 1 ABY, he purchased some reconditioned droids off some Jawas who visited the farm with their sandcrawler. However, the droids malfunctioned, attacked him and planted a bomb on a moisture vaporator. In the meantime, spacers working for Imperial Commander Barrezz as well as Rebel Captain Bastra arrived at the farm since they were both looking for the Jawas. Zef Ando recruited the help of a spacer to stop the droids and disarm the bomb.

Zef Ando was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Zef Ando was added to the game as part of the "Legacy Quest" with the release of the "Publish 25", a.k.a. the "New Game Enhancements", on November 15, 2005.
